AI Browser.label: AI Browser
AI Browser.description: Browser with integrated AI assistant or agentic capabilities that can understand page content, automate tasks, or act on behalf of the user.

Privacy.label: Privacy
Privacy.description: Browser with built-in and visible tracking protection, fingerprinting defenses, or anonymity features that prioritize user privacy over telemetry.

Open Source.label: Open Source
Open Source.description: Browser with publicly available source code that can be audited, modified, and redistributed under an open-source license.

Enterprise Browser.label: Enterprise Browser
Enterprise Browser.description: Browser purpose-built for enterprise deployment with centralized management, policy enforcement, governance controls, and security features designed for organizational use.
